title: Community
subtitle: Connect and share with other athletes

empty.title: No posts
empty.description: Follow users to see their workouts here
empty.noWorkouts: This user hasn't shared any workouts yet

features.connect: Connect with athletes at your gym
features.share: Share your PRs and celebrate wins

profile.createPrompt: Want to connect with the community?
profile.notFoundDescription: This profile doesn't exist or has been deleted

feed.title: Feed
feed.newPosts: {count} new posts | {count} new post | {count} new posts
feed.emptyFollowing: Follow users to see their workouts here
feed.emptyDiscover: No public workouts yet. Be the first to share!
feed.emptyYou: Share your first workout to build your profile

share.caption: Add a caption...
share.deleteConfirm: Remove this post from your feed?

comment.viewAll: View all {count} comments | View {count} comment | View all {count} comments

privacy.title: Privacy Settings
privacy.profileVisibilityDescription: Who can see your profile and workouts
privacy.publicDescription: Everyone can see your profile and workouts
privacy.friendsOnlyDescription: Only followers can see workouts (follow requests require approval)
privacy.privateDescription: Profile hidden, workouts cannot be shared
privacy.workoutDataVisibilityDescription: What others can see in your workouts
privacy.showDurationDescription: Show how long the workout lasted
privacy.showMuscleGroupsDescription: Show which muscle groups were trained
privacy.allowSearch: Allow others to find me via search
privacy.allowSearchDescription: Your profile will appear in search results
privacy.allowDiscovery: Suggest my profile to similar users
privacy.allowDiscoveryDescription: System will recommend your profile to users with similar goals
privacy.allowLeaderboardsDescription: Your records will be visible on leaderboards

description.public: Anyone can view your profile, follow, and see workouts
description.friendsOnly: Only followers can view profile and workouts (requires approval to follow)
description.private: Profile hidden from search, workouts not shareable

block.title: Block {username}?
block.confirmation: Are you sure you want to block this user?

effects.hidePosts: Their posts will disappear from your feed
effects.preventInteraction: They won't be able to interact with your content

block.reversible: You can unblock this user at any time in privacy settings.

report.description: Help us keep the community safe and friendly. Your report will be reviewed by moderators.
report.selectReason: Please select a reason for reporting

reasonDescriptions.hateSpeech: Slurs or attacks based on race, ethnicity, religion, etc.

report.detailsPlaceholder: Describe the issue in more detail (optional)...

errors.indexBuildingDescription: Database is updating. This may take a few minutes.
